results.title: Effect of metformin on biomarkers of placental- mediated disease: A systematic review and meta-analysis.
results.text_hl: We searched Medline, Embase and the Cochrane Library for studies of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ and biomarkers of @<m>DISEASE_Placenta_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D010922 @@@PMD@@@ in pregnancy.

citations.NLM: Anness AR, Baldo A, Webb DR, Khalil A, Robinson TG, Mousa HA. Effect of metformin on biomarkers of placental- mediated disease: A systematic review and meta-analysis. Placenta. 2021 Apr;107():51-58. PMID: 33798839

results.title: Modulation of placental angiogenesis by metformin in a rat model of gestational diabetes.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ showed protective effects by reducing @<m>DISEASE_Placenta_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D010922 @@@placental overgrowth@@@ and restoring vascular and oxidative balance.

citations.NLM: Eldakhakhny BM, Ghoneim FM, Soliman MFM, El-Khair SMA, Elsamanoudy AZ, Almoghrabi YM, Mohie PM, Hassan FE, Elfattah AAA. Modulation of placental angiogenesis by metformin in a rat model of gestational diabetes. Histochem Cell Biol. 2025 Jan 27;163(1):28. PMID: 39869176

results.title: High Glucose Promotes Inflammation and Weakens Placental Defenses against E. coli and S. agalactiae Infection: Protective Role of Insulin and Metformin
results.text_hl: More studies should be carried out in the future to elucidate whether @GENE_INS @GENE_3630 @@@insulin@@@ or @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ inhibit the activation of the main promoters of @DISEASE_Inflammation @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@inflammation@@@, especially NF-kappaB, in the @<m>DISEASE_Placenta_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D010922 @@@hyperglycemic placenta@@@.

results.title: Maternal body composition and the placental-fetal unit under maternal high-fat feeding partially improve by metformin treatment or lifestyle interventions during pregnancy in a mouse model.
results.text_hl: Since research has linked many of maternal and fetal sequelae to @<m>DISEASE_Placenta_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D010922 @@@placental dysfunction@@@, we tested if treatment with an anti-diabetic drug (@<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@) or lifestyle interventions improve maternal body weight, placental status or fetal growth.

citations.NLM: Kretschmer T, Turnwald EM, Thiele A, Kallage C, Neweling L, Kammerer M, Janoschek R, Zentis P, Handwerk M, Wohlfarth M, Kalis S, Nüsken E, Nüsken KD, Bae-Gartz I, Köninger A, Gellhaus A, Gründemann D, Hucklenbruch-Rother E, Dötsch J, Alejandre Alcazar MA, Appel S. Maternal body composition and the placental-fetal unit under maternal high-fat feeding partially improve by metformin treatment or lifestyle interventions during pregnancy in a mouse model. Placenta. 2025 Sep 24;171():91-101. PMID: 41016177

results.title: Novel approaches to combat preeclampsia: from new drugs to innovative delivery.
results.text_hl: These drugs show positive effects in preclinical studies, targeting @<m>DISEASE_Placenta_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D010922 @@@placental and endothelial dysfunction@@@.

citations.NLM: de Alwis N, Binder NK, Beard S, Kaitu'u-Lino TJ, Tong S, Brownfoot F, Hannan NJ. Novel approaches to combat preeclampsia: from new drugs to innovative delivery. Placenta. 2020 Dec;102():10-16. PMID: 32980138

results.title: Maternal Metformin Treatment Improves Developmental and Metabolic Traits of IUGR Fetuses
results.text_hl: These findings may be of high value for @SPECIES_9606 @@@human@@@ medicine in case of @DISEASE_Malnutrition @DISEASE_MESH:D044342 @@@maternal malnutrition@@@, since @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ is a cheap drug easily available, but also in case of @<m>DISEASE_Placenta_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D010922 @@@placental deficiency@@@, since @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ seems to improve placental development and function.

results.title: Oral Metformin Treatment Prevents Enhanced Insulin Demand and Placental Dysfunction in the Pregnant Rat Fed a Fructose-Rich Diet
results.text_hl: Oral @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ Treatment Prevents Enhanced @GENE_INS @GENE_3630 @@@Insulin@@@ Demand and @<m>DISEASE_Placenta_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D010922 @@@Placental Dysfunction@@@ in the Pregnant @SPECIES_10116 @@@Rat@@@ Fed a @CHEMICAL_Fructose @CHEMICAL_MESH:D005632 @@@Fructose@@@-Rich Diet

results.title: Protective effect of metformin on a rat model of lipopolysaccharide-induced preeclampsia.
results.text_hl: In this study, we used @CHEMICAL_Lipopolysaccharides @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008070 @@@lipopolysaccharide@@@ (@CHEMICAL_Lipopolysaccharides @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008070 @@@LPS@@@) to induce a @DISEASE_Pre_Eclampsia @DISEASE_MESH:D011225 @@@PE@@@-like @SPECIES_10116 @@@rat@@@ model and investigated the intervention effect of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@MET@@@ from the perspectives of clinical manifestations, placental morphology, serum marker for @<m>DISEASE_Placenta_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D010922 @@@placental injury@@@, systemic @DISEASE_Inflammation @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@inflammatory@@@ response and oxidative/nitrative stress, and placental nuclear factor-kappaB (NF-kappaB) signaling.

citations.NLM: Hu J, Zhang J, Zhu B. Protective effect of metformin on a rat model of lipopolysaccharide-induced preeclampsia. Fundam Clin Pharmacol. 2019 Dec;33(6):649-658. PMID: 31334867
